agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Energy Resources TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Monday, February 11, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Paddie The House Committee on Energy Resources will hold an organizational meeting to hear invited testimony only. The agenda will be made available at the hearing. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
